website_summaries.verdict: It's a solid choice if you want to spend about half the price of other top flashlights, but some others have more to offer.
pros: Sports a military-grade anodized finish and anti-reflective lens coating
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been great
customer_reviews.text: The brightest flashlight I have ever seen, & casts light a very long way, in a small compact package. Appears to be solidly built. I like that it has several brightness settings, & "remembers" the last one it was set on. I'm a security guard, & it's comforting to know that if one or more persons approach me in an aggressive manner I can blast them with light, & not only see better what's in their hands, but with their night vision affected, I can react as needed, & do it more effectively. If it turns out that there's no serious threat, there's no permanent injury to them or me. Kind of like pepper spray, but from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: T25 flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This item was not working when I received it. I'm in the process of returning it to Amazon. I had Hope's for it because it has the xp-l Hi V3 cree . I cannot recommend this flashlight. After emailing Eastshine, they said that I should send back the light and reorder it. I did send it back and recieved a good working flashlight . Eastshine did respond quickly to my email and problem is solved. Now I can say " I do recommend"the T25 flashlight. Works well and is very bright with good amount of throw. I cannot measure throw or lumens or candela but it beats my other name brand flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: D.F.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm tired of cheap flashlights and this one appears to be very well made ... at a less expensive price than the big name products. At max power using CR123 batteries, it's much brighter than my $50 Streamlight (which only has one power level). I especially like the fact that it remembers the last power setting when it's turned off. When you turn it back on, you don't need to cycle back through all the levels to find the one you want. I suppose a zoom feature would make it better, but to be honest, I doubt I would use it much. At this point I don't miss it.
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: You can tell just by opening the EASTSHINE box that you just got a good one. T25 is very well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellant product. You can tell just by opening the EASTSHINE box that you just got a good one. T25 is very well made, strong body, and well designed. Just unscrew the tail cap to the battery compartment and you can instantly tell. Love the tail switch (on/off) with the body switch to make adjustments. I have many flashlights in my arsenal, this one for the price, is by far the best non focusing light yet. Four light setting from super bright (blinding) all the way down to a lit match (map reading night conditions) plus a brain freezing strobe. Streamlight "Stinger" eat their dust.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Good light just didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: My Eastshine T25 was great while it lasted. I work in law enforcement and used this light quite a bit. However it just recently stopped working. I really liked it and other Officer was considering purchasing one but now I’m not so sure. I have no way of contacting Eastshine for a replacement or to fix my light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until the side button fell off
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this flashlight until the side button fell off. Now I can't change modes. Before this I loved the function and the light was very bright. I'll add a picture when I get a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Rtd

customer_reviews.title: I love this flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I love this flashlight I use the flashlight everywhere, I don't really use the 1000 Lumen setting but it's fun to play with. It took me a shameful amount of time to realize that this flashlight has a strobe light setting. While the flashlight is on just hold the brightness button and it will strobe at Max luminosity. I've dropped this thing a thousand times run it over with my truck, this thing has never quit on me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Watkins

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT LIGHT AT A REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I use the CR 123 batteries in this flashlight. The light fits my hand well and is easily held as it is physically light. On HIGH (which I prefer) the light gets hot after about 5 minutes. This is excellent inasmuch as the heat is a byproduct of an exceptionally bright flashlight. I would highly recommend it professionally for any first responders or any investigators. The light is great AND the cost is great too!
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly Simple = Long Life!
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave this as a present. It is MOST EXCELLENT! FINALLY! She has this thing for flashlights. We have dozens. Mostly, after a while, they're crap. Usually when they have a 3 x AA plastic battery holder you learn to expect that a bad connection will develop soon after buying. THIS PRODUCT USES ONE BATTERY ... ONLY TWO CONNECTIONS to the battery. It works excellently now ... and I predict, in 3 years from now. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brightness for the price
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight was better than I thought it was going to be. It’s brightest setting is like a spotlight and I can even light up my whole backyard with it. I was very impressed especially for the price. It seems to be constructed well and it has a decent battery life. It does get a little hot if you leave it on for 10 minutes, but not enough to burn anything. The battery is also easy to recharge. Very good light.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hough

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very close to the 1000 lumens it claims to put out. It's brighter than my other much larger flashlight that is 750 lumens. The strobe function is very effective. Good quality and works flawlessly. Don't use on the max brightness level indoors or if looking at something outdoors within a few feet of you or the light reflection will blind you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's a good flashlight, but the side switch is VERY hard ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good flashlight, but the side switch is VERY hard to press, painful to the thumb. At first I thought the flashlight is not working, until I realized you have to push it so hard to move from the "moonlight" mode. EDIT: I'm updating to 4 stars after the seller very efficiently contacted me and offered a refund or an exchange. I asked for an exchange and I hope it will arrive promptly and without issues. Will update again after it arrives. EDIT: Replacement arrived and it's perfect. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.D

customer_reviews.title: Fenix PD-35 Clone.
customer_reviews.text: This is almost an exact copy of the Fenix PD-35. it has a more traditional beam a spot in the center and flood around the edge. It's functions are exactly like the PD-35. If you don't want to pay the price for the Fenix this is a very very good copy and just as bright.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Juelfs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flashlight for the money! So far.
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight and great features at a reasonable price. The cheaper flashlights are garbage. This is essentially a smart LED flashlight with long 18650 life. The controls are easy to use and the quality seems much better than others. I've owned many flashlights and this is the most impressive for its price. I may update after I've used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ARLOVER

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Flashlight - Only flaw is the battery type
customer_reviews.text: Super bright!! This is a perfect tactical flashlight, or for sticking in your glove box! Far exceeds my old Maglight, and even my newer full-size LED flashlight! Only thing I'm not crazy about is that it uses non-standard batteries, so if you forget to charge them, you're out of luck and can't just stick in common batteries in an emergency, which is a bit of a flaw for using as part of a survival kit or anything long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Linc

customer_reviews.title: Tough and versatile, I own two
customer_reviews.text: Tough and versatile, I own two. The T25 does what a comparable Fenix does, but for less. Tough as nails, I really like the switchology of a rear button for on/off and thumb button to select intensities and options - a better configuration for old fingers IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Connor

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year.... Edit-Warranty replaced!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Edit from original 1 star review: Great light when it’s working. As you can see below, my original crapped out after 8 months. I was having issues getting in touch with them for a replacement until my amazon review. They reached out to me and are sending a replacement. Little more headache than it should have been but I’ll bring this up to 3 stars. $40 flashlight that lasts me 8 months? Lifetime warranty.... well the support number is not in service and the email address bounced back. Thanks Eastshine! No I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CIFchamp24

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright  Bright!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flashlight the throw is fantastic and bright. I have a Thrunite TN12 and TN11S and this flashlight beat both of them easily. I like the fact that it gives me a battery reading when I use it. This is great for Law Enforcement and Security work, you could easily disorient someone by using the strobe feature of this flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: MR POOSA

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love love this product with the price. Will be buying another one as backup. This flashlight with the 2 throw away batteries is perfect for EDC. Do your self a favor buy this! It also fits the focus light holster.
customer_reviews.author: Playthat funkymusic

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Flashliight!!
customer_reviews.text: This a very impressive flashlight!! I own two Fenix PD35s the EASTSHINE T25 performs just as well as the Fenix PD35!! As far as I am concerned the EASTSHINE T25 is an excellent flashlight!! Fit and finish and Flashliight performance 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A.

customer_reviews.title: super bright and durable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. This light is super bright, and sturdy. First one leaked water when crawling through a wet cave and quit working, but manufacturer stood behind their product and sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bret A Morey

customer_reviews.title: Love the brightness of this light
customer_reviews.text: Love the brightness of this light, for the very compact size. With Eastshine having a great reputation for their batteries, I was disappointed that it came without a battery.....seriously? Its a great price for the flashlight, but I would suggest a battery be included. If someone uses an inferior battery after their purchase, they will be disappointed with the performance of the flashlight. So, add a battery... Just a thought.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a real tactical light but the smallest bump and it's junk. Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.author: James Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday bright light
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that these are downgraded from the previous version I ordered, which has the S&R beacon, which I personally value a lot
customer_reviews.author: 05 Busa ltd

customer_reviews.title: This light is very impressive very bight great beam spread
customer_reviews.text: I have many flashlight: Fenix, Nitecore, ......This light is very impressive very bight great beam spread, very well made, very good programming my new EDC, please contact me asap when new products come out ......A++++ Eastshine! I almost for got very fast shipping Amazon A++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flashlight in October, 2017 and I love it! Recently the mode button on the side came off. I tried reattaching it but it wouldn’t stay on. I contacted Eastshine and explained the problem. They asked me to send the light to them. As soon as I gave them the return tracking number they sent me a code to reorder a new light at no cost from Amazon. This whole process only took a few days. I am very impressed with Eastshine’s customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cozz

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a very bright flashlight and this one surpasses my expectations. It lights up a large back yard and even leaves spots in my eyes when not looking at the light directly in a room. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, multiple brightness settings
customer_reviews.text: Police officer recommend this flash light and boy was he right. Great value for a high quality light. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joey J

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The brightness is great, and the variable settings are good. The irredeemable feature, however, is that the variable brightness button is simply a piece of removable rubber. The button falls out on its own all the time. I have lost and found and re-lost this button over and over, which makes the flashlight pretty much worthless. A very small, but very critical design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Chaisson Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great for EDC
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time reviewing this product the first one happened to be a defective flashlight but honestly after dealing with the customer service I have to say it's five stars all day it's a great little product has the most power I've seen out of something this small ever and I intend on caring my new one every day highly recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: david orozco

customer_reviews.title: Fenix pd35 clone
customer_reviews.text: After losing 3 $80.00 Fenix flashlights I tried this one being half the price and have never looked back. This light is excellent so far, the only thing I can say that may be viewed as negative is that lens quality may be a tiny bit less quality than the other brand.Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: nathan w watson

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good flashlight. Very bright, good beam (not adjustable), very well built. Comes with some accessories (sheath, lanyard, ect.) Ordered canwelum batteries and charger to power it. They work great with it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, focused, and easy to handle. I use it when moving semi trailers at work. The switch on the side for cycling through the brightness levels is perfect- I hate having to go through all functions with the power switch. Also, the "minimal" setting is genius and will be great when walking to a deer stand on a familiar path in near darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I had batteries from other lights, so this was put to use an hour after it arrived. So many lights use this LED, this is the cheapest, and one of the only without a SUB connector to break or let water in.
customer_reviews.author: Upfroggy

customer_reviews.title: Great flash light!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to figure out that you have to press the small grey button pretty hard when the light is on to change the light from dim to bright, but once I figured that out (via you tube) - great flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Smart

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Love the light its so bright id give it 5 stars but if you have it on for a long time on high it gets really hot like so hot im scared it may explode
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Limited Life in light use
customer_reviews.text: After 3 month of ownership, no exposure water, never dropped, the unit decided to never turn back on in any function. Now there's no warranty to cover it. Company looks like it went belly-up. Wonder why . . . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the Fobus Paddle Combo Mag Pouch which requires a 1" diameter max body on the flashlight. This fits perfectly. Light is very bright on high setting. I like the 4 settings...the low setting almost seems like it is off, but in a very dark room it is great to see without lighting up the room and waking everyone up.
customer_reviews.author: bnjblack

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Bright
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight it just what Seal Team 6 ordered! Very very bright!! Gets a tad hot when it’s on for over 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great compact flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight. It's small enough to fit in your pocket and it's very bright. It has three different settings of brightness. I liked it enough to buy a second one. This is now my favorite flashlight. I may have to purchase another one or two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money. I thought I had a problem the first time turned it on. No light! Be aware the very lowest setting probably isn't as bright as a candle. If you turn it on during the day you won't know it's on. But low is great for that late night trip to the outhouse without blinding your eyes. The highest setting will blind you. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Badten, L.

customer_reviews.title: The best flashlight purchase yet and i have tried many
customer_reviews.text: Very bright well made flashlight! Have had it a few months now using it every night no issues. The best flashlight purchase yet and i have tried many.
customer_reviews.author: m. delehanty

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen many other flashlights with these features for a lot more money. Very happy with this hi quality light.
customer_reviews.author: S. Matthies

customer_reviews.title: This flashlight is by far the best. Great price it's everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is by far the best. Great price it's everything as advertised. I'd buy this light again over any surefire. Surefire is to pricey and overrated. Highly recommended for law enforcement. PGPD
customer_reviews.author: AirborneKen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!Pictures dont do it justice.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed!!!Before it got hear i had concerns that the light beam may not go very far with no zoom feature.Wow! Was I wrong.Not only do you get crazy distance,but you get an amazing radius also.It truely is like a spotlight.You need to test it out in complete darkness without street lights or anything to appreciate the power this small flashlight has.You won't find better than this guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: I think I will not brake this one. I'm a mechanic retired, now I play on a small farm with lots of use for flashlites. You should buy this lite you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: Extreme quality for good cost.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about this light. It's absurdly bright (in a good way). Batteries last a long time. Compact size, I carry it all the time. If there were more stars it would get a higher score. This light is awesome. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Bridie Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Great light, amazing cost considering I’ve got another well ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light, amazing cost considering I’ve got another well known brand that ran almost $100 and doesn’t compare to this light! Kicking myself for not seeing this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Dendray E. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: really bright when set to the high mode. buy it.
customer_reviews.text: wow fantastic flashlight. well build super bright and overall a perfect flash light. i own hundreds of flashlight. this by far the one one i use now and worth all the hype. the holster also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Max

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent warranty service for this product. Very useful in oil and gas industry
customer_reviews.author: rico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good light, can't believe how bright and convenient to have it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: bmsa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this flashlight. It is super bright and the price is pretty reasonable. Recommend the batteries and charger too
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. Lost the first one and was "lost" without it. I like everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lamplighter

customer_reviews.title: Go into the light
customer_reviews.text: What a great flashlight, its bright as s**t. I just imagine this is the light you see whem you meet tacti-cool Jesus
customer_reviews.author: The dude

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight but expensive batteries
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight is very well made and performs as advertised. The drawback is the requirement for CR123 batteries which are expensive and not included.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Barnard

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard for budget buyers
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe this was $40. Every household and I'd argue every vehicle needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great field light
customer_reviews.text: Durable and rugged, but if use for several minutes gets really hot
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Its quality with accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Extremely bright, tactical, great settings, strong and light weight. Works perfectly for a shotgun light.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Save your money; buy another flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this flashlight for work, have owned it for about a month and it’s already broken. It was bright and great until it suddenly stopped turning on even after I purchased a fresh set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very bright flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is very bright and you shouldn't have any problem seeing whatever you want to see unless it's very far away.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly bright
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and charge lasts an extremely long time. In fact, the charge lasts the longest I have ever seen on a rechargeable flashlight
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This compact light is incredibly bright. Nearly matches my Stanley Fatmax. I also like the battery flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: DMFederalist

customer_reviews.title: It still works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this at work for about two months now. Dropped it a couple of times. It still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A well made light. Impressed with the location of the light level switch. May get another for work.
customer_reviews.author: Beenaround

customer_reviews.title: Have not used it much.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it much but it seems nice. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is fantastic. It has 4 levels of brightness and the highest level I would compare to a spotlight on a police car. It is ridiculously bright inside and outside. I use it inside a corrections facility and I love it. Better than any maglite I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Tim baker

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of this
customer_reviews.text: This is so good. 10 Times brighter that all other products in this category
customer_reviews.author: Mosi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best flash light ive ever owned. Though it takes its own kind of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT flashlight for everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding flashlight. We bought one for us and one for a gift. We use it for everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommyJo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Light
customer_reviews.text: I like the power, lumens, and the ability to change the brightness with a push of the switch. And the strobe could save one's life if lost in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, and perfect in size.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 2 weeks (not continuously) and provides alot of light, pretty compact, and the dual button makes holding with a pistol great. However there is a problem with over heating not at the light area only. The area you hold in hand gets extremely hot. It was 4 hours of room clearing so benefit of the doubt that I'm asking to much of it. Otherwise it's a really good light for the price. Have dropped it a couple of times and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurance

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you get it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great light if you get it. Already own one that I got as a gift. Ordered another one and the box was empty when I got it. Just had the case in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight works great, but the battery life indicator on the side does not work
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, built tough and has lived through a ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, built tough and has lived through a lot. Not only that but Eastshine's customer service is impeccable, this is a A1 product with a A1 company standing behind it. Do not hesitate to purchase this, or any other products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Krupinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight I have ever owned and I'm a flashlight freek !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight i've ever had. Very bright compare to other flashligt.
customer_reviews.author: Raved

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, this product has met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, this product has met all my expectations. It is bright and so far appears to be well made. The switch is solid operates very smooth. Am going to order another.
customer_reviews.author: John Menard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Light.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many tac flashlights over the years, but this in terms of price, power and quality, you're not going to find a better value than this. Extremely bright and durable. The shine is very similar to sunlight. It's nice that memorizes the last setting you had it on before turning off. Indicator light is useful as it turns red when in need of a recharge. A nice cache of accessories including a holster. Aesthetically pleasing. I could go on... FYI For the battery, I purchased a Nitecore NL89 and would recommend it if you're without a suitable 3400 mAh.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Davis

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give it 6 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a light with a power switch separate from the mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Bought a 2nd One after using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Bought a 2nd One after using the first one!
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL A RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this flash light is vary bright wish it had a zoom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sweet...wow is this thing bright for how small it is. works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. The only drawback is the battery life is short and the batteries are expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used it several times and the battery life has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flashlight. Strobe feature along with the other lumen settings give you plenty of options. Seems well built
customer_reviews.author: Durhamite77

customer_reviews.title: SUPER bright for size and weight!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no joke super super bright!! I have owned several led flash lights. Love all the different modes first edc I've seen with moonlight mode!
customer_reviews.author: BRAD MARKHAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super bright flash light! The only complaint is that is get hot pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: C. Birch

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few days... then stopped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and it stopped working one week later, tried new batteries and no luck. Surprised that do many positive reviews on this item. Eastshine has offered to replace or refund product.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great Light-
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazing. Super bright, and very rugged. I was able to light up an entire cornfield while driving with this light on my ATV helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Very handy flashlight, can really bright up a room ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy flashlight, can really bright up a room. I use it at work for my building inspections and hasn't failed me yet
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: You can change the brightness of the light with just a click of a button
customer_reviews.text: The light shines so far i can see across the river by my house
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Eastshine and Thank you Abby. I will never buy a light anywhere else.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would of been better had I received at least one battery with it . Other than that I'm pleased. UPDATE: After talking to Eastshine we got everything figured out.Big misunderstanding. THANK YOU ABBY AND EASTSHINE I WILL BE RECOMMENDING YOU TO ALL THE OTHER CONTRACTORS I WORK WITH. I'VE HAD SEVERAL LIGHTS BUT EASTSHINE IS THE BEST TO GO LIGHT WISE AND BATTERY WISE AND CUSTOMER SERVICE IS GREAT AND THEY ARE QUICK AND THEY TREAT YOU LIKE THEY REALLY CARE. DEF 5 STARS NOW.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: I wish you would have mentioned I need to purchase a special battery. I had no problem buying a special battery just didn’t have it when I needed it. The flashlight is epic. Love it compact size. Has a funky issue where if you screw the back all the way on the light turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpknocker

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket light I have ever bought, didn't come with batteries though. :(
customer_reviews.text: I am a heat and air service tech, I depend on a good pocket flashlight everyday. This light is hands down the best light I have bought for the price. I absolutely love this light!! I just wish it would have arrived with batteries. Either regular ones or a rechargeable battery. That would have made the deal great. But the light itself is great, I would recommend it to anyone needing a flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical no more
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I've never heard of this brand of flashlight before, so I was very skeptical about this light until I turned it on. Super bright and can throw really far! This light illuminates far away objects much better than my Fenix UC35, my Nitecore P12, and my Atactical A1S. I would gladly trade any one of my more expensive flashlights for another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Zoomzoom1968

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight holder broke within 5 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: I received my flashlight yesterday, I work nights and it arrived just before I had to leave which was perfect. Within 5 minutes of use the flashlight holder attached to my belt had broken and my flashlight fell down multiple flights of stairs. There was no force involved I was simply just walking. The flashlight seems to work fine, however the rest of the items included seem to be for novelty, they are poorly made and could cause you to damage your flashlight. I highly recommend you don't use them and definitely don't buy this product because it comes with 'extras'.
customer_reviews.author: Ben read

customer_reviews.title: does not work -- returned
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Does not work, at all. Using brand new batteries that are powering another flashlight just fine. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Asked

customer_reviews.title: Poor knurling on on body would not make gripping this ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. Poor knurling on on body would not make gripping this light any easier.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

product_meta.title: EASTSHINE Tactical Flashlight, T25 CREE XP-L HI V3 LED 1000 Lumens Compact Handheld 350Yards Searchlight EDC Outdoor Portable Light
product_meta.description:
NOTICE:

PLEASE CHECK WHETHER THE BODY TUBE IS CONTRARY. The BatteriesIncludes But Not Limited to:

1. Streamlight 85177 http://a.co/ja78knv
2. Nitecore NL189 http://a.co/6dPi1j9
3. Orbtronic 18650 http://a.co/gZOC3tF


Specification:

1. Max Output: 1000Lumens
2. Max Beam Distance: 320M / 350 Yards
3. Max Beam Intensity: 25,700Cd
4. Max Run time: 520Hours / 21.67 Days on Low Level
5. LED: CREE XP-L HI V3
6. Reflector: SMO
7. Battery: 1 × 18650, 2 × CR123
8. Special Modes: Strobe
9. Beam Color: White Light
10. Length: 145 mm / 5.56 in
11. Head Size: 25.4 mm / 1 in
12. Weight: 89 g / 0.21lb


Features:

1. Precision Digital Optics Technology provide extreme reflector performance
2. Side switch interface provides one-handed operation and easy access to all functions
3. Side switch features an indicator light which displays remaining battery power
4. Features advanced temperature regulation technology
5. Intelligent memory function stores preferred brightness setting
6. High-efficiency regulation circuit provides unwavering output
7. Toughened ultra-clear mineral glass with anti-reflective coating
8. Constructed from aero grade aluminum alloy with HAIII military grade hard-anodized finish
9. Impact resistant to 1.5 meters
10. Stainless steel titanium-plated two-way clip included
11. Tail stand capability


Package Content:

1. 1 x EASTSHINE T25 Tactical Flashlight(Without Battery)
2. 1 x Tactical Ring
3. 1 x Clip
4. 1 x Lanyard
5. 1 x Holster
6. 2 x Spare O ring
feature_bullets: 1. What you get: EASTSHINE T25 Tactical Flashlight(without battery), Holster, Tactical Ring, Clip, Lanyard, O Ring, Happy Card, Worry-free 24 Months, Lifetime Maintenance, 18650 battery Sold Separately.

2. Tactical Flashlight: Tactical Tail Switch with Momentary / Constant Illumination. For Law Enforcement, Military, Policeman, Side Switch with Various Modes / Brightness Levels for Gear, Indoor and Outdoor.

3. Smart Handheld Flashlight: T25 Auto-detect Temperature, Adjust Brightness to keep Cool and Cozy to Operate, Switch Indicator to Display Remaining Battery Power, Anti-skid Interface, One-handed Operation.

4. Ultra Bright Flashlight: 1* 18650 Compact Size, CREE XP-L HI V3 LED, White Light to 1000 lumens, 25,700cd Intensity, 350 yards Beam Distance, 520 hours Running Time, Replace your Wide Reflector Searchlight.
5. Buy Together: Get 2PCs or More For Family, Friends, Yourself. One for House, Night, Emergency, Gift, Other for Car, Traveling, Hunting, Camping, Cycling, Hiking.
